page.title: Culture Exam Practice
page.subtitle: Practice for the Cypriot history and culture exam with timed mock tests. Each exam contains 25 questions with a 45-minute time limit. You need 60% (16/25) to pass.

history.title: Recent Exam History
history.empty: You haven't taken any exams yet. Start your first mock exam to begin tracking your progress!

states.notEnoughQuestions: Not enough questions available to start an exam. At least 25 questions are required.
states.examInProgress: You have an exam in progress. Would you like to continue where you left off?

session.question: Question {{current}} of {{total}}
session.abandonConfirm: Are you sure you want to abandon this exam? Your progress will be lost.
session.recoveryDescription: You have an unfinished mock exam. Would you like to continue where you left off?
session.warning5minDesc: Make sure to submit your remaining answers.
session.warning1minDesc: Your exam will auto-submit when time runs out.

session.noQuestionsDescription: No questions available for this exam.
